course.title: Rereading Russian Intellectual History
course.description: This seminar reviews the standard texts and topics of pre-Revoluationary Russian intellectual history. Course readings include works by Chaadaev, Herzen, Belinsky, Chernyshevsky, Pisarev, Bakunin, Solovyov, and others.The seminar also considers methodological problems and how approaches to writing Russian intellectual history have evolved from the last half of the twentieth century to the post-Soviet era.
